alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 10:47AM MST until January 17 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations through 1 PM of 1-2 inches for northern Salt Lake County, locally higher on benches. Little or no snow accumulation for southern portions of the county. * WHERE...Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Moderate snow showers will continue to impact While amounts are forecast to be light, even light amounts of snow falling on cold surfaces could lead to morning commute impacts. Thus, a Winter Weather Advisory has been issued.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
